# ZudoMart & My Services (Full)

## Executive Summary
I build secure, user-friendly digital products for entrepreneurs, creators, and small businesses. My work spans front-end development, cybersecurity-informed design, AI-enabled product concepts, and operational support. A core focus is **ZudoMart**, an African-first startup currently in MVP refinement for trust-first commerce, service delivery, and creator monetization.

## About ZudoMart
ZudoMart is an MVP-stage product for African entrepreneurs that brings together:
- Marketplace listings for goods and services
- Micro-gigs and freelance services
- Live commerce and creator monetization
- Trust, verification, and escrow protection

The platform is being refined around a multi-layer trust engine to reduce fraud and support safer digital trade.

## ZudoMart Capabilities
- **Marketplace & Micro-gigs**: Buy, sell, and offer services securely.
- **Escrow Payments**: Protects both buyers and sellers until delivery is confirmed.
- **AI Fraud Detection**: Six-tier verification to reduce scams.
- **Hyperlocal Discovery**: Campus and neighborhood filters for relevant local matches.
- **Live Stream Commerce**: Real-time selling with virtual gifts.
- **ZudoReels**: Short-form product videos to drive discovery.
- **Localized Payment Options**: Regional methods for easier adoption.
- **Creator Monetization**: Built-in tools for earnings and growth.

## Who It Serves
- Micro-entrepreneurs and small merchants
- Campus sellers and hyperlocal traders
- Creators and live commerce hosts
- Service providers offering micro-gigs

## My Services
- **Software Engineer**: Responsive, accessible, high-performance Software experiences.
- **Secure Product Design**: Threat-aware UX and safe transaction flows.
- **AI-Enabled Product Prototyping**: Planning features and workflows that leverage AI responsibly.
- **Startup Technical Guidance**: MVP definition, roadmap clarity, and product-market fit support.
- **Virtual Assistance**: Admin support, scheduling, and operational coordination.

## Engagement Types
- Product strategy and UX planning
- UI implementation and front-end delivery
- Security-first reviews for web products
- Early-stage startup technical support
